item.title: Automated Network Map construction
item.description: Collaborations Workshop 2018 - 2018-03-26 Automated Network Map construction - HP13-CW18 Hackday Idea Proposer Diana Suleimenova - diana.n.suleimenova@gmail.com Context / Research Domain An idea of constructing an automated network maps initiated from refugee simulation context. However, this can be useful for other scenarios where researchers or practitioners have multiple locations and require to know how these locations are connected and their distances represented visually. There are also other domains that use simulations for animal and bird migrations, as well as vehicle movements that require visual representations (i.
